1.1.name: wordpress/wp-alphabetical-post-listing
1.1.description:
This plugin creates a listing of your posts/pages or category.

you need to use a shortcode to embed the listing in a post page or sidebar.

Example Usage

  1. [atoz]
  2. [atoz type="page"]
  3. [atoz type="category" title="A-Z Category"] note: default values are type="post" title="A to Z listing"
